name: Ubuntu VNC Desktop
postCreateCommand: sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /home/vscode/.vnc && sudo chmod -R u+rwX /home/vscode/.vnc && echo 'VNC setup complete! Password: ubuntu'
postStartCommand: vncserver :1 -geometry 1280x720 -depth 24 -localhost no || (echo 'VNC server failed to start'; exit 1) && sleep 2 && websockify --web=/usr/share/novnc 6080 localhost:5901 || (echo 'websockify failed to start'; exit 1) && echo 'VNC server started on :1 (port 5901). noVNC on port 6080.'
